Featuring a panoramic sea-view location in Oia on the island of Santorini, Canvas Suites offers spacious traditionally furnished suites.  Each suite is air conditioned and include a kitchenette, a flat-screen satellite TV and a terrace with sea views. The private bathroom is complete with a hairdryer. Some rooms boast a private indoor or outdoor hot tub. Breakfast supplies including milk, juice, honey, jam, coffee and tea, are provided in every room.
